actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution relating to the Romanian Trade Agreement.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the United State Senate that before requesting a review and extension of the 1975 United States-Romanian Trade Agreement the Administration shall submit a full report to Congress on fundamental human rights and cultural freedoms in Romania. Provides that if no measures are taken to ameliorate the situation of national minorities by the Romanian Government, the 1975 United States-Romanian Trade Agreement and the most favored-nation treatment of the Socialist Republic of Romania shall not be extended.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the Romanian Trade Agreement.
